pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, January 27, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Barbados, Mia Mottley.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Latvia, Arturs Krišjānis Kariņš.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver opening remarks at the virtual National Caucus Winter Retreat.

The remarks will be streamed live via the following link: https://www.cpac.ca

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the virtual National Caucus Winter Retreat.

Closed to media

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during a virtual International Holocaust Remembrance Day event.

Media interested in watching the event live can register via the following link: https://www.eventbrite.ca/e/international-holocaust-remembrance-day-tickets-244473505837
